Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Houston in 1983...
Injured on 7/11/1983 with a Broken Finger, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/24/1983 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/11/1985 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Injured on 8/22/1985 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/1988, off John Stuper (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1988, off Bill Caudill (LA)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1991, hitting .455 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1991, hitting .388 with 5 HR, 35 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 4/7/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1994, hitting .429 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won World Series with Houston in 1994...
Won World Series with Houston in 1995...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1996, hitting .414 with 5 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1996 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/15/1996 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
